text:
Created attachment 29984
Adjust nested conditions.

If a hash begins with '$' but is not blowfish or the custom apr algorithm, I think apr_password_validate() should still "feed it to crypt() if possible" as it did in 1.4.6.  As presently implemented, apr_password_validate() instead fall out and uses an uninitialized char array in a string comparison.  The nested conditional statement appears to a programming error.  I've attached a patch that I think adjusts the conditional statements appropriately.

Thanks for the patch.
Fixed in r1449308 for apr trunk and r1449309 for apr 1.5.x.
Will be part of 1.5.2.
